summary: I RUN A RENTAL CAR CO.  IN THE PAST 6 MONTHS I HAVE HAD 5 OF THE FIRESTONE S4S STEELTEX RADIAL 16 INCH TIRES, THAT THE TREAD HAD ROLLED OFF THE 15 PASS VAN, SOMEONE IS GOING TO GET HURT BAD ..  I WENT TO THE LOCAL FIRESTONE STORE AND ALL THEY WANT TO DO IS MAKE AN ADJUSTMENT ON THE TIRES THAT FAILED, BUT I HAVE THIS TIRE ON ALL 7 OF MY VANS AND I AM AFRAID TO RENT THEM OUT... I NEED SOME HELP FROM FIRESTONE TO REPLACE ALL OF THESE TIRES...HELP ME BEFORE SOMEONE GETS HURT.  *JB
